vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.21;
son of: Seir (H8165B);
brother of: Lotan (H3877), Shobal (H7732), Zibeon (H6649H), Anah (H6034H), Ezer (H0687), Dishan (H1789) and Timna (H8555H);
father of: Hemdan (H2533), Eshban (H0790), Ithran (H3506), Cheran (H3763)
Also named: di.shan (דִּישָׁן "Dishon" H1789H)
§ Dishon = "thresher"
1) the fifth son of Seir
2) the son of Anah and grandson of Seir
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   antílope ; (2a)   hijo de Seír; (2b)   descendiente de Seír
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
底順 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "打榖者"
1) 西珥的第五個兒子 (代上 1:38)
2) 亞拿的兒子及西珥的孫子 (代上 1:41-42)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
底顺 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "打榖者"
1) 西珥的第五个儿子 (代上 1:38)
2) 亚拿的儿子及西珥的孙子 (代上 1:41-42)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.25;
son of: Anah (H6034H);
brother of: Oholibamah (H0173H)
§ Dishon = "thresher"
1) the fifth son of Seir
2) the son of Anah and grandson of Seir

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.21;
son of: Seir (H8165B);
brother of: Lotan (H3877), Shobal (H7732), Zibeon (H6649H), Anah (H6034H), Dishon (H1787), Ezer (H0687) and Timna (H8555H);

1) the fifth son of Seir
2) the son of Anah and grandson of Seir
